complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Directus API Service implementation into detailed subtasks, including core configuration, service methods for different content types, caching strategies, error handling, and testing procedures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating multiple service files with complex API interactions, authentication, error handling, and caching strategies. The interconnected nature of these services and the need for robust error handling increases complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for implementing the BaseLayout, Header, Footer, and Navigation components, including responsive design, accessibility features, and styling with the SCSS architecture.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating layout components requires careful attention to responsive design, accessibility, and proper HTML structure. The task involves multiple interconnected components that form the foundation of the site's structure.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the homepage development into subtasks covering the hero section, featured content sections, data fetching implementation, GSAP animation integration, and accessibility considerations for animations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task combines complex GSAP animations with data fetching and multiple interactive components. The requirement for reduced motion alternatives and performance optimization adds significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Recipe Listing Page with Filtering
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for the recipe listing page covering the filter UI implementation, search functionality, pagination, GSAP animations for transitions, and responsive design considerations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex client-side filtering, search with debounced input, pagination, and animated transitions between states. The interactive nature and multiple filtering options increase complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the recipe detail page implementation into subtasks covering dynamic routing, content sections, interactive components, GSAP animations, and responsive design considerations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The recipe detail page requires dynamic routing, multiple interactive sections, and complex animations. The need to handle various content types and implement error handling for missing recipes adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for the blog listing page covering the filter implementation, pagination, GSAP animations for transitions, and responsive design considerations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Similar to the recipe listing page but with different filtering requirements. The complexity comes from implementing pagination, filtering, and animated transitions between states.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the blog detail page implementation into subtasks covering dynamic routing, rich text content rendering, author information display, GSAP animations, and responsive design considerations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The blog detail page requires handling rich text content, dynamic routing, and complex animations. Rendering various content types correctly and implementing proper error handling adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for implementing tag and category pages, including dynamic routing, mixed content display, content type toggling functionality, and GSAP animations for transitions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: These pages require handling mixed content types and implementing dynamic filtering based on URL parameters. The content type toggling and associated animations add significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the GSAP animation library implementation into subtasks covering scroll animations, reveal effects, transitions, interaction animations, and reduced motion alternatives.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating reusable animation components requires deep knowledge of GSAP, performance optimization, and accessibility considerations. The need to support reduced motion alternatives and ensure cross-browser compatibility increases complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Image Optimization and Lazy Loading
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for image optimization covering the image service implementation, responsive image component, lazy loading functionality, and blur-up/LQIP implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Image optimization involves complex considerations for performance, responsive design, and user experience. Implementing proper lazy loading and placeholder strategies adds technical complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the accessibility and SEO implementation into subtasks covering SEO components, structured data, accessibility features, reduced motion alternatives, color contrast checking, and screen reader announcements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires comprehensive knowledge of accessibility standards and SEO best practices. The wide scope covering multiple aspects of the application and the technical requirements for proper implementation make this highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Error Handling and Performance Optimization
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for error handling and performance optimization covering error boundaries, loading states, API error handling, performance optimizations, custom error pages, and analytics implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves implementing robust error handling throughout the application while also optimizing performance across multiple dimensions. The technical breadth and depth required make this one of the most complex tasks.
